mapper.sql: id, bank_name, province_name, city_name, bank_id, branch_code, branch_name, branch_address, branch_tel, gmt_modified, gmt_created
mapper.select: select distinct bank_name, bank_id from bank order by bank_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into bank (id, bank_name, province_name, city_name, bank_id, branch_code, branch_name, branch_address, branch_tel, gmt_modified, gmt_created) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into bank (id, bank_name, province_name, city_name, bank_id, branch_code, branch_name, branch_address, branch_tel, gmt_modified, gmt_created) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.branchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.branchAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.branchTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
